analysis_metadata.analyst_notes: Mobile viewport captures critical magenta brand section below desktop fold

style_snapshot.art_direction: Dramatic black-and-white photography with electric magenta brand punctuation

background_primary.where_seen: main content areas, client logos section

brand_primary_magenta.where_seen: hero CTA section, accent elements, key messaging area

text_primary.where_seen: main headings, body text on white

cta_button.where_seen: See How button with white text

typography_kit.casing: Title Case for headings, sentence case for body

text_treatments.special_effects: high contrast white text on magenta

composition.alignment: center-aligned hero with left-aligned content blocks

safe_areas.facebook_cover: 60px outer padding with centered focal point

social_recipe_1080: Create magenta accent block #FF00FF in upper third
Add 40px padding on all sides for mobile-safe area
Place headline in bold sans-serif 48px with tight leading
Use black text #000000 on white, white text on magenta
Add rounded black CTA button with white text

design_patterns.hero_treatment: Dark overlay on dramatic B&W photography
design_patterns.brand_moment: Electric magenta section creates visual break
design_patterns.content_hierarchy: Bold headings with clean body text
design_patterns.client_showcase: Minimal logo grid on white background

visual_feel_description: The design feels like stepping into a high-end tech consultancy's sleek office space. The black and white photography creates a serious, professional foundation like polished concrete floors, while the electric magenta punch feels like neon accent lighting that demands attention. The overall experience is confident and forward-thinking - imagine a Tesla showroom meets creative agency. The typography feels crisp and authoritative, like expensive business cards with perfect letterpress. The layout breathes with intentional white space, creating a sense of premium positioning and clarity of purpose.
